tool_description: Selects appropriate reference standards and gauge blocks for calibrating instruments based on measurement requirements and traceability needs.

calibration_points.description: Specific calibration point values in millimeters

error_messages: Insufficient reference accuracy: Available standards do not meet the required uncertainty ratio.
Calibration points out of range: Some requested points exceed available standard ranges.
Invalid uncertainty ratio: Ratio must be at least 3:1 for reliable calibration.
Traceability level unavailable: Requested traceability level not available for these measurements.
No suitable standards found: No reference standards meet all specified requirements.
usage: Specify measurement range, accuracy requirements, and calibration points. Tool recommends optimal reference standards meeting traceability and uncertainty requirements.

selected_standards.description: List of recommended reference standard identifiers

achievable_uncertainty.description: Best achievable measurement uncertainty in micrometers
